overview: Final Capstone Project for my Bachelor degree in User Experience Design;This project had us form groups of five, where we were supposed to create an application that would be useful in a specific situation of use of our choosing. Over 13 weeks, we would undergo various steps in a preliminary and main design cycle...

para2: {Step 1: Seting up the team}$timeline$~a little paragraph here.~$team expectations$~what do we want to achieve, what are our strengths and weaknesses and how do we all prefer to work...~$meetings and minutes$~We also figured out [*what times we would be available *locations to meet up];And we made notes and took minutes of everything so that people who couldn't show were able to catch up, and for documentation and later convenience for the report.~
para3: {Establishing a situation of use}~Addressing the paradox of consumer waste and unmet donation needs, the 'Drop it Off' platform efficiently connects consumers with various organisations in need of specific donations. The platform will help streamline the donation process to maximise the impact of surplus goods and therefore minimise consumer waste.$Rich Pictures$Throughout the design process, our rich picture expanded [assets/proj/dropitoff/methods/STEP0a-stakeholders-main.jpg,assets/proj/dropitoff/methods/STEP0b-rich-picture.jpg,assets/proj/dropitoff/methods/STEP0c-stakeholders.jpg]~
